data.title: County Fixtures 2024
data.meta_description:
2024 Junior Trials 

Junior B Doubles
Cashel Johnny / Dan Delaney v Ballyporeen David Reilly / Bea Reilly in Ballyporeen on Saturday Dec 2nd at 7.30 pm

Junior Doubles
Anthony Crotty/ Ned Reilly Ballyporeen v Jerome Cahill /Colin Ryan in Cashel on Friday December 1st at 7.30 pm

Inter Club 40x20 2012 Updated 7/11/2012

40/20 Inter-Club 2012 County Fixtures

Junior B in Nenagh on Sun 11th November @ 2 P.M.

S/F Ballina V Nenagh

S/F Ballinahinch V Lahorna

Winners Nenagh

Final @ 4.30 P.M.

---------------------------------------------

Junior

S/F Cashel V Ballyporeen Sun 11th

Final: Winners V Youghalarra in Cashel Wed. 14th

The 40x20 Inter-Club competitions format in 2012 are as below:

· There will play-offs at County level only [No Provincial competition]

· Each county is allowed one entry in the National competition in the grades listed below.

· National competitions will be played in Galway venues in the W/E of 1st and 2nd December 2012.

·

· OPEN Club Championship Competition: 1 entry (Ballina)

All Matches will comprise: 2 x Doubles Games (2 Games 25 minutes). (each pair play 1 Game of 25 Minutes)

Total Aggregate scores will be added together over the 2 games in the match with the highest aggregate score advancing/winning.

Timed Game Rules Apply - ie. One Fault = Hand-off. (normal rules otherwise)

* in the Event of a Draw the Pairs in the Court (2nd Doubles remain and play 5 Minute game.

· INTERMEDIATE, 0 Entry

JUNIOR, Youghalarra, Cashel, Ballyporeen

JUNIOR B Club Championship Competition Ballina, Nenagh, Lahorna, Ballinahinch

· All Matches will comprise: 2 x Doubles Games (2 Games 25 minutes). (each pair play 1 Game of 25 minutes)

· Total Aggregate scores will be added together over the 2 games in the match with the highest aggregate score advancing/winning.

· Timed Game Rules Apply - ie. One Fault = Hand-off. (normal Rules otherwise)

* In the event of a Draw the Pairs in the Court (2nd Doubles) remain in and Play on for 5 Minutes

Players may play on one team only.

County secretaries please run off your competitions and send your entries in all grades including player’s names [including sub] to Croke Park by:

Friday November 23rd 2012.

=================================================================================

TIPPERARY HANDBALL BOARD

Please Note All Players Representing the County Must wear the proper Handball Jersey in All Games and wear Tipperary Shorts or Plain White Shorts (This is a Munster Council directive)
